films.name: Bad Boys for Life
films.story: Miami detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett must face off against a mother-and-son pair of drug lords who wreak vengeful havoc on their city.

films.name: Birds of Prey: And the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn
films.story: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroes Black Canary, Huntress and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.

films.name: Bloodshot
films.story: Ray Garrison, a slain soldier, is re-animated with superpowers.
films.writers: Jeff Wadlow (screenplay by), Eric Heisserer (screenplay by)

films.name: Extraction
films.story: Tyler Rake, a fearless black market mercenary, embarks on the most deadly extraction of his career when he's enlisted to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned international crime lord.

films.name: My Spy
films.story: A hardened CIA operative finds himself at the mercy of a precocious 9-year-old girl, having been sent undercover to surveil her family.

films.name: Sonic the Hedgehog
films.story: After discovering a small, blue, fast hedgehog, a small-town police officer must help him defeat an evil genius who wants to do experiments on him.
films.writers: Patrick Casey (as Pat Casey), Josh Miller

films.name: The Way Back
films.story: Jack Cunningham was an HS basketball phenom who walked away from the game, forfeiting his future.Years later, when he reluctantly accepts a coaching job at his alma mater, he may get one last shot at redemption.

films.name: The Gentlemen
films.story: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

films.name: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
films.story: The surviving members of the resistance face the First Order once again, and the legendary conflict between the Jedi and the Sith reaches its peak bringing the Skywalker saga to its end.
films.writers: Chris Terrio (screenplay by), J.J. Abrams (screenplay by)

films.name: Onward
films.story: Two elven brothers embark on a quest to bring their father back for one day.
films.writers: Dan Scanlon (original story by), Keith Bunin (original story by)
